name: Jayasuriyan RP
summary: Strategic and results-driven Technical Specialist with 11 years of experience delivering high-impact full-stack software solutions using Golang, .NET Core, C#, React, and Angular. Proficient in architecting scalable microservices, building cloud-native applications on Azure, and streamlining DevOps pipelines. Adept at mentoring cross-functional teams, driving innovation through automation and scripting, and consistently aligning technical initiatives with business goals.
